sub_topic: Calculating the surface area of a cube.
message_1: A cube has a side length of 5 cm. What is the surface area of the cube in square centimeters?
message_2: A cube has 6 faces, and the area of each face is the square of the side length. So, the area of one face is 5 cm * 5 cm = 25 square centimeters. Since there are 6 faces, the total surface area of the cube is 6 * 25 = 150 square centimeters.
